desc: This course continues the aural study of chromatic harmony, melodies and 20th-century rhythms introduced in 211. Students also work on basic improvisation skills, including working from jazz chord symbols, improvising melodies from given guidelines, improvising cadenzas, and improvising jazz melodies. Prerequisites: Music 211 and 213. Offered Spring Semester.
name: Improv and Aural Skills
notes: Students in Music 212C must also register for Music 214C.
prerequisites: Prerequisites: Music 211 and 213. Offered Spring Semester.
title: Aural Skills and Improvisation
